content:
Yes, there are many other horror comic book adaptations that have been turned into TV shows. Here are some examples:

1. The Walking Dead spin-off series: Fear the Walking Dead, set in the same universe as The Walking Dead, is a horror series that follows a different group of characters in a different location.

2. Outcast: This horror series is based on the comic book series of the same name by The Walking Dead creator Robert Kirkman.

3. Locke & Key: This supernatural horror series is based on the comic book series by Joe Hill and Gabriel Rodríguez.

4. iZombie: This supernatural horror series is loosely based on the comic book series of the same name by Chris Roberson and Michael Allred.

5. Constantine: This horror series is based on the DC Comics character of the same name, created by Alan Moore and Steve Bissette.

There are many other horror comic book adaptations that have been turned into TV shows over the years, but these are just a few examples.
